Title: Requires the commissioner of health to establish and maintain a list of toxins which members of the military may have come into contact with
Summary: Requires the commissioner of health to establish and maintain a list of toxins which members of the military may have come into contact with; requires doctors to ask patients whether they have served in the military.
LawCode: Amd ยง206, add Art 38-A ยง3810, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring the department of health to establish and maintain a list of toxins which members of the military may have come into contact with and requiring doctors to ask patients whether they have served in the military
